title: WatchGuard Firebox
descriptionMarkdown: WatchGuard Firebox (https://www.watchguard.com/wgrd-products/firewall-appliances and https://www.watchguard.com/wgrd-products/cloud-and-virtual-firewalls) is security products/firewall-appliances. Watchguard Firebox will send syslog to Watchguard Firebox collector agent.The agent then sends the message to the workspace.
additionalRequirementBanner: These queries are dependent on a parser based on a Kusto Function deployed as part of the solution.

sampleQueries.query:
WatchGuardFirebox
 | where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by HostName
| top 10 by count_ desc

sampleQueries.description: Firebox Named WatchGuard-XTM top 10 messages in last 24 hours
sampleQueries.query:
WatchGuardFirebox
 | where HostName contains 'WatchGuard-XTM'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by MessageId
| top 10 by count_ desc

sampleQueries.description: Firebox Named WatchGuard-XTM top 10 applications in last 24 hours
sampleQueries.query:
WatchGuardFirebox
 | where HostName contains 'WatchGuard-XTM'
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(24h)
| summarize count() by Application
| top 10 by count_ desc

dataTypes.name: Syslog (WatchGuardFirebox)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
WatchGuardFirebox
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
WatchGuardFirebox
  |where TimeGenerated > ago(3d)
    |take 1
   | project IsConnected = true

instructionSteps.description: **NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected which is deployed as part of the solution. To view the function code in Log Analytics, open Log Analytics/Microsoft Sentinel Logs blade, click Functions and search for the alias WatchGuardFirebox and load the function code or click [here](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-Sentinel/blob/master/Solutions/Watchguard%20Firebox/Parsers/WatchGuardFirebox.txt) on the second line of the query, enter the hostname(s) of your WatchGuard Firebox device(s) and any other unique identifiers for the logstream. The function usually takes 10-15 minutes to activate after solution installation/update.

instructionSteps.title: 1. Install and onboard the agent for Linux
instructionSteps.description:
Typically, you should install the agent on a different computer from the one on which the logs are generated.

>  Syslog logs are collected only from **Linux** agents.

parameters.title: Choose where to install the agent:

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on Azure Linux Virtual Machine
instructionSteps.description: Select the machine to install the agent on and then click **Connect**.

instructionSteps.title: Install agent on a non-Azure Linux Machine
instructionSteps.description: Download the agent on the relevant machine and follow the instructions.

instructionSteps.title: 2. Configure the logs to be collected
instructionSteps.description:
Configure the facilities you want to collect and their severities.

1.  Under workspace advanced settings **Configuration**, select **Data** and then **Syslog**.
2.  Select **Apply below configuration to my machines** and select the facilities and severities.
3.  Click **Save**.
